We present two illustrative examples for visualization (top-middle and top-right). Furthermore, we compare our BMMR-Eval with other benchmarks regarding size and diversity (bottom-left). A comparison of model performance on BMMR-Eval versus MMMU is also included (bottom-middle), highlighting the challenging nature of our test set. Finally, we demonstrate that fine-tuning open-source models of various sizes (3B-78B) on our BMMR-Train yields significant performance enhancements (bottom-right).
